pkgmetadata.longdescription:
OAuth version 2.0 is a follow-up on OAuth 1.0, which is not supported by this module. The specification for version 2.0 can be found in
. RFC6749, Authorization framework: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749 . RFC6750, Bearer token usage: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6750 Start with one these modules:
. Net::OAuth2::Profile::WebServer . Net::OAuth2::Profile::Password
